import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { ChevronDown, Github, Linkedin, Mail, ExternalLink, Menu, X, Code, Palette, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; import Navigation from './components/Navigation'; import Hero from './components/Hero'; import Projects from './components/Projects'; const Portfolio = () => { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('hero'); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [mousePosition, setMousePosition] = useState({ x: 0, y: 0 }); useEffect(() => { const handleMouseMove = (e) => { setMousePosition({ x: e.clientX, y: e.clientY }); }; window.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove); return () => window.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove); }, []); const skills = [ { name: "Frontend Development", icon: Code, level: 95 }, { name: "UI/UX Design", icon: Palette, level: 88 }, { name: "Backend Development", icon: Zap, level: 85 } ]; return (
{/* Animated Background */}

{/* Navigation Menu */}

{/* About Section */}

Experience

My professional journey and the skills I've developed along the way.

I specialize in modern web technologies and have a keen eye for design. My journey started with curiosity about how things work, and evolved into a passion for creating seamless user experiences.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or mentoring aspiring developers in the community.
